explains: vt. (在重要性或意义上) 超过；比 (某人) 重

sentences.en: The book's virtues far outweigh its faults.
sentences.cn: 这本书优点远远大于缺失。

sentences.en: The advantages of this deal largely outweigh the disadvantages.
sentences.cn: 这笔交易的利远大于弊。

sentences.en: It seems that the disadvantages often outweigh the advantages of ecotourism.
sentences.cn: 似乎生态旅游的弊大于利。
